original_title: Chandima Jeewandara shortlisted for BCI Early Career Research Excellence Award
original_body_lines: Professor Chandima Jeewandara of Sri Jayewardenapura University has been shortlisted for the award of Early Career Research Excellence Award at the inaugural BSI Immunology Awards organised by the British Society for Immunology.
The BSI Immunology Awards aim to celebrate the remarkable achievements of individuals and teams shaping the future of immunology in a variety of ways.
The BSI Award will be announced on April 20, 2023 at the 'Transforming the immunology landscape' event during the BSI Immunology Awards networking reception and ceremony to be held in London.
Thirty-two professionals throughout the world have been shortlisted under six categories for the awards.
